toc.text: Debian/Ubuntu 等基于 apt 的系统
RHEL/CentOS 等基于 yum 的系统

["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["由于 MariaDB 版本较多，建议在",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://downloads.mariadb.org/mariadb/repositories","rel":"nofollow","children":"官方页面"}],"上生成配置文件内容。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-等基于-apt-的系统","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 等基于 apt 的系统"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/MariaDB.list"}],"，填入工具生成的配置内容，并将其中的地址部分，例如："]}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"https://apt.mariadb.org/mariadb/repo"}],"

",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"http://yum.mariadb.org"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"换为"}],"
